top_districts.name: Ixelles
why: Cafes around Flagey Square attract a vibrant community and offer diverse dining options.
Schools like St. Boniface provide excellent education, making Ixelles family-friendly.
watch_out: High demand may lead to competitive pricing and quick sales in preferred areas.

top_districts.name: Etterbeek
why: Parc du Cinquantenaire offers green spaces, ideal for families and outdoor activities.
Good international schools cater to expat families, fostering community connections.
watch_out: Potential noise from nearby traffic may impact peaceful living experiences.

top_districts.name: Saint-Gilles
why: Cafes and brunch spots in the area create a lively atmosphere for socializing.
The presence of diverse schools appeals to families and expats alike.
watch_out: Rental prices are rising, making properties less affordable for families.
